Title / Source: Bone age assessment based on deep neural networks with region extraction and gender-assisted models
Key Points: Two-stage deep learning pipeline using bone region localization plus gender-assisted classification; achieves low MAE; uses large annotated dataset; automates region detection

Title / Source: Deep learning-based automated bone age estimation for clinical use
Key Points: Clinical validation of DL methods for automated bone age with improved accuracy and efficiency over manual reading; also integrates gender info

Title / Source: AE-BoNet: A Deep Learning Method for Pediatric Bone Age
Key Points: CNN-based model for precise pediatric bone age estimation showing strong performance on benchmark datasets
Benchmark dataset with 12,611 hand X-ray images, labeled by bone age and gender; widely used for development and assessment of DL models

Title / Source: Fully Automated Bone Age Assessment on Large-Scale Dataset
Key Points: Describes preprocessing, segmentation strategies, and deep CNN architectures tested on large datasets with strong results

Title / Source: An Unsupervised Deep-Learning Method for Bone Age
Key Points: Introduces an unsupervised convolutional autoencoder approach to encode key regions and cluster bone age; reduces labeling requirement

Title / Source: An accurate pediatric bone age prediction model using CNN
Key Points: Focuses on CNN design improvements, ensemble techniques, and data augmentation to boost model accuracy on pediatric bone age datasets

Title / Source: Report of Clinical Bone Age Assessment using Deep Learning
Key Points: Overview of DL methods applied for clinical bone age assessment with emphasis on reliability and application in pediatrics
Community challenge with datasets and leaderboards that spurred advances in bone age DL methods; source of benchmarking and baseline models

Title / Source: External validation of deep learning-based bone-age models
Key Points: Studies validation of DL bone age models on external clinical datasets confirming robustness and generalizability

Title / Source: Deep focus approach for accurate bone age estimation
Key Points: Proposes refined image focus techniques and multi-scale feature extraction networks to improve prediction accuracy

Title / Source: Bone Age Assessment Using Various Medical Imaging Modalities and AI
Key Points: Survey covering various imaging modalities (X-ray, MRI) and AI techniques used in bone age assessment

Title / Source: Age Estimation from Left-Hand Radiographs with Deep Learning
Key Points: Approach using CNNs for age regression from left hand X-rays with discussion on preprocessing and augmentation

Title / Source: M-CNN-RF: A hybrid deep learning model for accurate bone age prediction
Key Points: Combines multi-scale CNNs and random forest regression to improve accuracy over sole CNN based models
